summary: This is the first of many to come Follower mods.
descriptionHtml:
This pack includes 3 new followers and one new location called Smugglers Refuge. I will be adding more files to this mod later on with more followers with different builds and new locations.

Any feedback will be appreciated.

The Followers are called Grela, Trish and Laria.


Location: Across the river in riverwood.

Requirements: ApachiSky Hair mod.

Recomendations (Use the search bar):

Bellas better females 

CBBE body

installation: Add the .esp to you skyrim data directory.
author: Drumerboy
